Created for "I can't draw" game jam

Only windows and linux releases was tested!

I'm started to learn godot engine several months ago and decided that I have enough skills to participate in some free-themed game jam to get game developing experience.
I haven't any plan or idea how this game should looks like. That’s why it have no goal, contain only one level, have not enough sound effects and i have to remove some incomplete features like powerups, different types of enemies and shooting ability.
